title: Walt Disney Co begins 7,000 layoffs
description: LOS ANGELES — Walt Disney Co on Monday began 7,000 layoffs announced earlier this year, as it seeks to control costs and create a more “streamlined” business,…

title: How to stop another Bernie Madoff wrecking investors’ lives
description: It's only a matter of time before we see another episode like the Bernie Madoff scandal. This is what needs to happen if we're to prevent it.
